Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{3: 'As Noctis continues walking, he unfolds the note that Murray gave him earlier, revealing a place name that he has never heard of.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "If he's still alive...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis tightens his grip on the note and photo, his robotic left hand generating a surge of electrical sparks that ignite them, reducing them to ashes.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Ha, then I'll send that guy to hell with my own hands one more time.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He gazes at the drifting ashes in his palm, his fist clenched in determination. A wave of phantom pain surges through him, a stark reminder of the severed left arm from that fateful event.'}
{3: 'Suddenly, something weird on the arm catches his attention.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'What the hell is this...', 4: '1'}
{3: "In a concealed spot on his robotic arm appears a cute puppy sticker. The puppy has its mouth open, displaying a silly demeanor... Without even thinking, he is sure that this is No. 21's doing."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Ugh, not on my new arm! When did 21 put this on? I'm gonna kill her for real...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis clenches his teeth, feeling an impulse urging him to reach out and remove the sticker. However, after a second thought, he slowly withdraws his hand.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Tsk, it's kinda cool after a close look... Guess I'll spare her this time.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He claps his hands together, a smile adorning his face as he dusts off the remaining ashes.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "It's about time... to finish what should be done.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}

{3: 'Inside the office of the Control Court, a sense of oppression always hangs in the air. The immense pressure exerts its force, causing individuals burdened with their own inner demons to become terrified even before the staff begins presenting their evidence.'}
{3: 'However, the red-haired Construct remains clearly unaffected, sitting with elegant poise in a chair and calmly sipping black coffee.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: "It's a bit bland... Constructs' taste receptors aren't the best to begin with. Make sure to serve up a stronger blend next time, alright?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: "Hearing Vera's provocative words, the Construct of the Control Court remains unfazed, upholding her customary smile without displaying any visible reaction."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'It appears that you\'re well aware that today is the final day of our investigation, so you came here to the Control Court... to "cooperate" with us.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Can't be a drag on the important work of the Control Court, after all... But first things first, you gotta bring some evidence to the table.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'We will.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Vera's face tightens into a frown, her smile fading away."}
{3: "The smile on Ishmael's face stays unchanged as her fingers gently tap against the table."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I mean... There will be. And it won't be long.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Before long, the office door is opened. A Control Court Construct nods at Ishmael, hands her a memory unit and leaves in silence.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Although you all claim to not remember the details of the battle, we can still find out what happened on that day with this.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'What are you going to do?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'This backdoor program allows me to extract the combat data recorded in the restraint...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'While detailed data is unavailable, we can still find out clearly who disabled the restraint.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Only Kurono has access to No. 21's frame information. Control Court has clearly received their help."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'What? No. 21 finally has her M.I.N.D. stable. Are you going to drive her crazy again?!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'We are not the ones to decide whether this will be used or not... You are.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Vera gives Ishmael a furious, silent stare.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'We still have some time today... Take your time, Vera. Maybe you will be able to recall something about that battle soon.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'About you, about No. 21... As well as the place you call "Hetero Zone" and the new Hetero-Creatures bred there...', 4: '2'}
{2: '???', 3: "Sorry to let you down, but there's no need."}
{3: 'Before the auto door opens, a hand pulls it open with brute force.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'You are... Noctis from Cerberus.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Even Ishmael is slightly perplexed at Noctis' sudden appearance."}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Noctis...? What are you doing here?! Get lost.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "Ha, Captain. I'm not here for you.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Ishmael notices someone familiar behind Noctis.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Lesti... Did you bring him here?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Hearing her name, Lesti barely squeezes through the gap between the door and Noctis into the office.'}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: "I'm here! Are you mad at me...?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Ishmael lets out a slight sigh—she rarely does so—before continuing to speak.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'No... But I believe I have told you not to bring unrelated personnel into the Control Court today.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: "But Noctis isn't unrelated... He said he came to turn himself in.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ishmael rests her chin on a hand and stares at Noctis in silence, not displaying much interest.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Turn himself in...', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Noctis', 3: "That's right. I was the one who disabled 21's restraint!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Everyone becomes speechless for a short moment. Vera finally speaks again with her hand on her forehead.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Enough, Noctis... Do you even know what you are talking about?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Of course I do. The joke's on you, Captain... You didn't even notice that I swapped the key.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Laughing out loud, Noctis takes out the magnetic restraint key that he prepared.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lesti', 3: 'Ishmael, this appears to be identical to the key we retrieved from No. 21.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'But no data could be extracted from the key found at the battle site, as it was severely damaged.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Lesti... Check it.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Lesti gives Ishmael a quick, cheerful salute and leaves with the key.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Mr. Noctis, I have no idea where you got this... But I must remind you that perjury and forged evidence are both serious offenses.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Ishmael calmly sits back in her chair, turning her smile toward Noctis.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'However, if what you said was true... Then you also must be punished accordingly.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Noctis glances at Vera out of the corner of his eye, then waves his hand nonchalantly.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Of course. I will bear the responsibility.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Alright. Can you please describe what you did?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I had contact with Vera's weapon container long ago and swapped the key at that time. She has been holding on to the fake key all along.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Of course it was a lie—Noctis steals a glance at Ishmael to observe her reaction, but finds no unusual response. She just sits there quietly, waiting for Noctis to continue.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Ahem. I then found some "technicians"... From unofficial sources, of course. They helped me to gain access to it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Why would you do that?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "It's very simple. Just think about it: If your teammate is a maniac who could go berserk at any time, you would want a method to control her, right?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Murray told Noctis how to answer these questions long ago.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "If that's the case, why did you disable No. 21's restraint at that time?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'Because 21 and Vera were holding off the most powerful enemy. If they failed, we would be the next...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I wanted them to at least buy me some time, so I disabled 21's restraint. Maybe she could even finish Vera off for me—then nobody would find out about the fake key.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Vera can no longer hold back her chuckle.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Really? I never knew you were so smart.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: 'You flatter me... But I have always been.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera has no idea what Noctis is doing, but she vaguely senses that he has a plan. Instead of stopping him immediately, she chooses to sit back and watch.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Then why did it take you so long to tell us the "truth"...?', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Noctis', 3: "Because you had been investigating everything and everyone. It's only a matter of time before you get me, so I figure that instead of getting busted, I should just turn myself in. At least my penalty would be less severe.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'It could have saved both of us a lot of time if you figured it out earlier.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Ishmael closes her notebook terminal and smiles at Vera.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'As for the credibility of your testimony... I think we will soon find out.', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The office door is opened again as she speaks. Lesti has returned with the magnetic key. She walks to Ishmael and whispers in her ears.'}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: 'This key seems to be genuine... Or, at least it is identical to the one we have got. The record inside shows that it has only been used by Noctis indeed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I see. Thanks.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Ishmael takes the key from Lesti and puts it on the desk without even looking at it.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Noctis, we have investigated this key. It is indeed a genuine one, and we only found your usage history inside.', 4: '2'}

{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'But according to the combat operation report submitted by the Gray Raven commandant, two of you were together throughout the entire operation... When did you activate the magnetic key then?', 4: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Noctis becomes speechless. It seems he has never thought about that question.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Vera shakes her head and gives Noctis an "enough" look.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'But Lesti suddenly lets out a short exclamation as if she has remembered something.'}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: 'Oh, my bad! I was too busy this morning and forgot to tell you. The Gray Raven commandant modified the operation report!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: "Don't worry, Gray Raven Commandant. There are only two of us in the room now...", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0.8', 4: '0.8', 5: '0'}
{3: 'As Lesti claps her hands, the room suddenly goes dim. The screen that was previously playing the combat report loses all the images as if it is experiencing strong interference.'}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: 'Now all the eavesdropping and surveillance devices—if there was any—should have gone silent.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The Control Court lady specifically picked a time to visit you when all Gray Raven Constructs were out for missions. The reason for her visit was also quite intriguing.'}
{2: "I won't change the combat operation report.", 3: '179'}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: "Why... I've been begging you for so long...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lesti lets out a sigh and naturally sits opposite to you.'}
{2: "What's your purpose?", 3: '183'}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: "Purpose... It wasn't really my purpose. I was just asked to do it.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lesti curls her bangs around her finger, mumbling with her cheeks puffed out.'}
{3: 'As a member of the Control Court, even if she only holds a junior position, there is still no need for her to get herself into trouble for no reason.'}
{2: 'Is that so? May I know who asked you?', 3: '187'}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: "I'm not allowed to disclose that. Still... I can't just let go of it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: "Anyone with common sense can tell that this investigation was all because of Kurono's report. I don't know why they want to target Vera so badly...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Resting her chin on her hand, Lesti giggles and looks at you. You have no idea whether she is telling the truth or not.'}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: 'Honestly, I am not that keen about my job. But I really hate to be used like a tool.', 4: '1'}
{2: "So do I. That's why I have no plan to help you.", 3: '195'}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: 'But this suggestion came from Noctis himself... I really hope you can consider it again, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lesti takes out a statement written by Noctis.'}
{3: 'While some of the details are obviously fabricated, most of the statement appears to be highly credible as it contains information that only someone who had been in that battle would know.'}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: 'Most people consider Noctis a trouble maker and treat him like a hot potato... I know that feeling too well.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Lesti's smile disappears. She hands you the operation report once again, now with a rarely-seen serious look."}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: "I don't know what Cerberus means to Noctis. But if he is so determined to do so, he must have his reasons.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lesti pats herself on the thigh and gets on her feet. The usual cheerful smile comes back to her face.'}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: "Well, I'll excuse myself here... But I'll leave the report here with you. I think I have done what they asked me to do.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Looking at the operation report and Noctis' statement, you let out a sigh, but grab the pen eventually..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory46.jpg'}

{1: '1', 3: "Ishmael browses through the Gray Raven commandant's combat operation report. Part of the content has been modified. Most importantly, it now clearly indicates that Noctis went solo for a certain period of time."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "All the evidence has aligned... It seems there's nothing that we can refute.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ishmael looks at Vera with a flawless smile.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I apologize for wasting your time, Cerberus Captain Vera...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She then turns to Noctis with an even brighter smile.'}

{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "As for you, Noctis... Considering the multiple acts of insubordination you have committed during the combat, including unauthorized actions and disabling fellow member No. 21's restraint without permission...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "The final sentence will be sent to you later, but there's one thing I can tell you right now. Unfortunately, you will never return to Cerberus again.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Noctis casually waves goodbye, then pushes the door open and leaves without even looking at Vera.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "That's a good member you have... Vera.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: 'Hah... Not anymore.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After seeing Vera off, Lesti asks Ishmael a question nonchalantly.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lesti', 3: 'Are we going to just close the case like this?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I think so. The end result should make those people happy. After all, the evidence is "conclusive," isn\'t it?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: "I really don't understand why they are so obsessed with Vera... But speaking of which, you also seem quite interested in this case. Why?", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Ishmael casually glances at the mission report. It mentions the Hetero Zone—a special Red Tide area generated from Inver-Hetero Towers, also the birthplace of new Hetero-Creatures.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Can I ask you a question, Lesti?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: 'Why do you always answer my question with more questions...? But yeah, go ahead.', 4: '2'}
{3: "Lesti giggles, but her eyes still focus on Ishmael's every action."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Do you think... humans are animals?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: 'Humans evolved from animals, right? Of course they are animals...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'What about Constructs then? Do you think we are humans?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Lesti cannot grasp the true meaning of her question, but she still pretends to be indifferent.'}
{2: 'Lesti', 3: "I think we are... At least my favorite clothing and makeup haven't changed after becoming a Construct.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I see. A beautiful answer.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ishmael gives a smile without looking at Lesti at all. She just picks up the mission report and flips through it, page by page.'}
{3: "Something's changing in this world, isn't it?"}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Vera', 3: 'Hey you... Stop right there.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera halts her steps and asks Noctis to stop, who had been walking forward without a word after leaving the Control Court.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "It's about time you tell me why you go to such lengths to take the blame. Nobody's going to believe that you could fool the Control Court on your own!", 4: '2'}
{3: "Unable to refute, Noctis is speechless for a long time before looking into Vera's eyes again, not avoiding her questioning gaze."}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "There's something I must do... A truth that I want to find out no matter what.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera does not seem surprised at all. She leans against the wall, thinking with her eyes closed.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "I can more or less guess it... But you won't be free to move around even after leaving Cerberus.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "I know, but I'll find a way. That part you don't have to know, Cap.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Hah. Cap...? I'm not your captain anymore, idiot.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Noctis looks rejected for a fleeting moment, but he quickly waves it off with a cheeky grin before walking away.'}
{2: 'Noctis', 3: "That's cool. I hate owing others... So I'm just returning a favor to you... to Cerberus.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Vera no longer responds. She just watches Noctis leave in disdain.'}
{2: 'Vera', 3: "Returning a favor? How naive. The Cerberus name doesn't come that easy.", 4: '2'}
